content: this legal text summarizes a case involving two parties pl and pf who are terminating their joint ownership of multiple real estate units in municipality castelfidardo the properties consist of apartments garages and exclusive courtyards which are described in detail the parties have agreed to divide the assets into two shares with each party receiving specific properties the value of each share is specified in euros additionally the text mentions the transfer of a roof slab and the requirement for authorizations and permits for any modifications the summary concludes with the signatures of the parties involved
